## Maintenance Type
- [ ] Code cleanup
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Security updates
- [ ] Other

## Description
Describe the maintenance task that needs to be performed.

## Rationale
Explain why this maintenance is necessary and what benefits it will provide.

## Scope of Work
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3

## Estimated Effort
- [ ] Low (1-2 hours)
- [ ] Medium (Half day)
- [ ] High (Full day or more)

## Additional Notes
Add any other context or notes about the maintenance task.
